instructions:
Character Sheet designed to play **Warhammer 40k Deathwatch** pen & paper RPG by Fantasy Flight Games.
This Sheet does Not require API scripts.
Most of the sheets functions are described with **Info Tooltips** hover over fields and buttons to see them
For more information visit the documentation wiki page at
[Deathwatch Improved Wiki](https://wiki.roll20.net/deathwatch_improved)
**IMPORTANT TIP** The roll template is best displayed in chat when **turning off the ENABLE CHAT AVATARS** option in the My Settings tab.
If you have any questions, suggestions or feedback, send a private message to [Author Mago](https://app.roll20.net/users/986445/mago) **Revision 1 Sep 2024**
